# Documentation Creation Summary

**Project:** NN Modeler (formerly kNN5)  
**Date:** 2025-12-03  
**Status:** âœ… Complete

## Overview

Comprehensive documentation created for NN Modeler following best practices for open-source software documentation.

## Approach

- **Balanced** - Equal focus on users and developers
- **Modular** - Organized by audience and purpose
- **Concise** - Dense semantic content, minimal verbosity
- **Visual** - Mermaid diagrams and screenshots throughout
- **AI-Ready** - Dedicated AI context documentation
